original_text: Make a hole in the top of the robe, in the middle. Make an edge around this hole, for the priest's head to go through. Make the edge so that it will not tear.
korean_text: 두 어깨 사이에 머리 들어갈 구멍을 내고 그 주위에 갑옷 깃 같이 깃을 짜서 찢어지지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: Make a hole in the top of the robe
Make an edge around this hole
for the priest's head to go through
Make the edge so that it will not tear
